mcp.js - MCP JavaScript API
==================================================

mcp.js is a collection of libraries that allow you to interact with local MCP nodes using HTTP connections.

The following documents will guide you to install and run mcp.js, and provide API reference documentation with examples.


Document directory:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :glob:

   source/Start
   source/Account
   source/Request
   source/Contract
   source/Utils
   source/Abi
